data.message: I will be an eminem fan till he is gone from da rap game. Ive already seen him once but i vaguely remember it cause it was in 1997. The up in smoke tour at the thomas and mack center in Las vegas which is were im at of course. I hope he is around for years to come. Like many of u said he dont give a fuck about nothin and no 1 and he tells true stories bout his life. I will see him again someday
